ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors would like to thank the Amapá Foundation for Research Support (FAPEAP), the Research Program of SUS-PPSUS-Ministry of Health, Coordination of Improvement of Higher Education Personnel (CAPES)/Ministry of Education (MEC), National Council of Scientific and Technological Development-CNPQ, the Laboratory of Microbiology (LEMA) of UNIFAP under the responsibility of Prof. Aldo Proietti Aparecido Júnior, Pro-rector of research and post-graduation-PROPESPG, Federal University of Amapá-UNIFAP, and Laboratory Adolpho Ducke under the responsibility of Eloise Andrade.
